data.eml:eml: We have developed a smartphone app ("Koala Counter") to help you record koala sightings. There is information about the app and the project on the Discovery Circle website at: http://www.discoverycircle.org.au/projects/koala/IF YOU CANNOT USE THE SMARTPHONE APP... we have set up this website so that you can still record koala sightings (without using a smartphone). INSTRUCTIONS: we have created a short video to demonstrate how to submit a koala sighting on this website: https://vimeo.com/discoverycircle/record-a-koala-sighting
